#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int t,i,j,k,x,y,ans,temp;
    char c[100000];
    cin>>t;
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%s",c);
        x=y=ans=temp=0;
        while(1)
        {
            if(c[temp]=='N')
            {
                y++;
                ans+=x;
                temp++;
                continue;
            }
        else if(c[temp]=='S')
        {
            y--;
            ans-=x;
            temp++;
            continue;
        }

       else if (c[temp]=='E')
        {
            x++;
            ans-=y;
            temp++;
            continue;
        }
        else if(c[temp]=='W')
        {
            x--;
            ans+=y;
            temp++;
            continue;
        }
        else
        {
            if(ans<0)
            ans=0-ans;
            printf("%ld\n",ans>>1);
            break;
        }

        }
    }

    return 0;
}
